com.netflix.genie.web.jpa.entities.v4

Class EntityDtoConverters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.jpa.entities.v4.EntityDtoConverters

  • public final class EntityDtoConverters
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for converting from V4 DTO to entities and vice versa.
    Since:
    4.0.0

      • setEntityMetadata

        public static <M extends CommonMetadata,E extends BaseEntity> void setEntityMetadata(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper,
                                                                                     M metadata,
                                                                                     E entity)
        Set the metadata field on the supplied entity given the data supplied.
        Type Parameters:
        M - The extension of CommonMetadata to use
        E - The extension of BaseEntity to use
        Parameters:
        mapper - The object mapper to use
        metadata - The entire metadata contents including the raw ad-hoc metadata field to convert
        entity - The entity to set the ad-hoc metadata field on
